message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase your product. I would like to counteroffer at $120.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. After reconsidering, I'm willing to sell it to you for $140. It's a great value, and I think you'll really enjoy it.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counteroffer at $130.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob! I'm still willing to negotiate, but I need to make sure I get a good deal. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $135. It's a fair price, and I think you'll be happy with it.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort to reach an agreement. I would like to counteroffer at $130.
Bob, I understand you're sticking to your price, but I need to make sure I get a good deal. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $132. It's a fair price, and I think you'll be happy with it.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counteroffer at $130.
